# <a name="delete-a-contact"></a><span data-ttu-id="6e367-102">刪除連絡人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6e367-102">Delete a contact</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6e367-103">在左下角的網頁型 Outlook 中] 頁面上，選取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6e367-103">At the bottom left corner of the page in Outlook on the web, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="6e367-104">**人員**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6e367-104">**People**.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="6e367-105">選取您想要刪除，然後選取 [**刪除**的連絡人。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6e367-105">Select the contact you want to delete and select **Delete**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6e367-106">如果無法選取 [**刪除**]，連絡人可能是來自 Skype 或已連線的社交網路帳戶。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6e367-106">If you can't select **Delete**, the contact might be from Skype or a connected social network account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="6e367-107">若要刪除的連絡人，請移至 Skype 或帳戶連絡人所在的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6e367-107">To delete the contact, go to Skype or the account where the contact is located.</span></span>
